Interactive Market Discussion

We will harness the intellectual horsepower of our members to figure out where the market is going.

Risk Management and Position Sizing by Patrick McMahon

Tonight's presentation will be on risk management and position sizing.  One of the most important factors in obtaining longevity as a trader or investor is avoiding big losses.  Professional traders use relatively equal amounts for each trade to reduce volatile swings in their accounts.  Tonight we will cover this in more detail as well as complete an exercise in class.

Bio - Patrick McMahon is a swing trader and currency trader with Maverick Trading and Maverick FX respectively.  In the equity markets, Patrick uses a top down approach to establish a market sentiment, identify out-performing and under-performing sectors, and select stocks that are leading or lagging their sector.  He uses equity option spreads (verticals, diagonals, and ratio diagonals) for his directional trades.  In the currency markets, Patrick uses relative strength to identify volatile currency pairs that are consolidating or retracing on a 15-min chart.

Stock Picks / Trade Ideas

We will analyze members ideas for stocks to trade and how to trade them.

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google.com/bostonibd

If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you!

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone.

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.

 You pick the topic and we will discuss it en groupe.
